body.p: In 2007 the Board added to its agenda a project to clarify the scope and accounting for group cash‑settled share‑based payment transactions in the separate or individual financial statements of the entity receiving the goods or services when that entity has no obligation to settle the share‑based payment. In December 2007 the Board published Group Cash‑settled Share‑based Payment Transactions (proposed amendments to IFRS 2). The resulting amendments issued in June 2009 also incorporate the requirements of two Interpretations—IFRIC 8 Scope of IFRS 2 and IFRIC 11 IFRS 2—Group and Treasury Share Transactions. As a consequence, the Board withdrew both Interpretations.
